channel.title: My Development Questions=
channel.description:
Ok i have a huge list of questions that i would appreciate if you could answer Here they are: 1.How Do I make it where an npc brings up a shop (An autospawned npc i put in myself)? 2.How Do I make it to where if someone "Searches Hay Bale" that they get exp? 3.How Do I change the location that someone spawns when they make a character? 4.How Do I Add Objects (Fence for example.)? 5.How Do I Make my own custom made Emotes (teleporting,getting items,etc)? 6.How Do i make my own classes? 7.How do i make my own commands? 8.What is the Best server source to start with (for beginners)? 9.How nooby am i? :/ lol
please answer these!! ty btw to answer them please do this for example: 1. blah blah blah blah blah blah blah
ty: ][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2007, 04:25:52 PM[/size][hr]hello? o.o

item.title: My Development Questions=
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

really nooby lol
and makeing your graphics includes editing cache if i am correct?

hay bale
add this

[code]case 299: //Defense Hay

if(actionTimer == 0)
{
startAnimation(645);
addSkillXP((150playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((100playerLevel[3]), 3);
actionTimer = 30;
}
break;[/code]

under the switch (ActionType) {

[code]public void DoAction() {

viewTo(destinationX, destinationY);

switch (ActionType) {[/code]

to spawn some1 its in player.java

search

heightLevel = 0;

then you see like

teleportToX = ++++; teleportToY = ****;

++++ = x co-ords
yyyy = y co-ords

Read full topic
